images.caption: Figure 1.An overview of TeleAntiFraud-30k.Our system addresses the challenges of telecom fraud detection. We create the TeleAntiFraud-28k dataset through three strategies: Real-Data ASR Processing, LLM-Based Imitation adn Augmention, and multi-agent adversarial synthesis. We also construct TeleAntiFraud-Bench for model evaluation and contribute a supervised fine-tuning model with an open-sourced data processing framework.

Figure 3.Architecture Diagram of the Multi-Agent Adversarial Framework
